Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the production of the movie 'Baaghi 3' released in 2020?
Options:
A. The movie's production was announced on December 19, 2018.
B. Tiger Shroff was not involved in the production of the movie.
C. The announcement was made by Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment.
D. A teaser poster was released alongside the announcement.
Answer: The movie's production was announced on December 19, 2018., The announcement was made by Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment., A teaser poster was released alongside the announcement.
